content: this legal text discusses the progress of a case involving the division of assets in a succession the parties involved are not named the text mentions several properties such as apartments and land located in municipality castelfidardo it also refers to a vehicle and a bank account owned by the deceased the parties have agreed to end the current state of coownership and divide the assets into four shares each party has been assigned specific properties and their corresponding values additionally the text mentions the settlement of outstanding debts owed by some of the parties
